TopicTitle: A robot designed to explore asteroid/comets surface

Articles.Content:
In order to move more efficiently on extremely low gravity environment like on an asteroid, they are thinking of new designs.

Not exactly a new idea, but for some reason it really reminds me of some ksp when you roll a capsule around using just its op reaction wheel. Anyway, it seems like promising for travelling around on dangerous terrain, though seems like it would be limited to using RTG for power only, since I doubt solar panels like being rolled around.
